item.name: [2202] Attempt to create contact template with duplicate name

exec: const nextRequestInCaseOfFailure = "[2202] Show list of contact templates after contact template creation"

pm.test("Since the alias is a unique identifier, the contact template with name " + pm.collectionVariables.get("contactTemplateNameBis") + " has not been created.", function () {
